label: Image Recognition that triggers augmented reality
description: Matt Mills and Tamara Roukaerts demonstrate Aurasma, a new augmented reality tool that can seamlessly animate the world as seen through a smartphone. Going beyond previous augmented reality, their "auras" can do everything from making a painting talk to overlaying live news onto a printed newspaper.

label: Augmented Reality iOS Tutorial: Marker Tracking
description: In this augmented reality iOS tutorial, you will create an app that uses a technique called marker tracking. The idea is your app will process the video frames from your device, looking for a marker – usually an image or a QR-Code. Once the app finds this marker, it will display your own 3D content at that position.

label: Tutorial: Top 10 AR SDKs for Developers
description: This 3 hour session lead by Patrick reviewed the best Mobile AR SDKs in the market and how to get started with them, followed by vendor presentations. You won’t find a better summary and comparison of the leading AR SDKs by an independent person who’s worked with literally all leading AR SDKS.

label: How To Enable Augmented Reality for Explorer on iPad or iPhone
